name: COVID19SNOMEDValueSetForHistoryOfCerebrovascularAccident
title: COVID19 SNOMED Value Set for History of Cerebrovascular Accident
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains terms related to personal history of cerebrovascular accident (cerebral infarction/stroke) and is listed as a cardiovascular disease on the CDC SARS-CoV-2 hospitalization surveillance case report form.),(Data Element Scope: ),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes personal history of cerebrovascular accident (cerebral infarction/stroke).),(Exclusion Criteria: Excludes transient ischemic attack and sequelae or complications of cerebral infarction.)
